Control Name: INCIDENT MONITORING | AUTOMATED TRACKING / DATA COLLECTION / ANALYSIS
Control Statement: The organization employs automated mechanisms to assist in the tracking of security incidents and in the collection and analysis of incident information.Supplemental Guidance:  Automated mechanisms for tracking security incidents and collecting/analyzing incident information include, for example, the Einstein network monitoring device and monitoring online Computer Incident Response Centers (CIRCs) or other electronic databases of incidents. Related controls: AU-7, IR-4.
